Class ExternCommand

java.lang.Object
  external.ExternCommand

public class ExternCommand
extends java.lang.Object

Class for running external programs on the commandline.

3.0

Method Detail

execute

public static final java.lang.String execute(java.lang.String command,
                                             boolean verbose)
Executes a command on the commandline shell.

Parameters:
command - String object holding the command to be executed.
verbose - if TRUE than information on the executed command will be printed on STDERR, FALSE otherwise.
Returns:
String object holding the STDOUT and STDERR outputs of the external command.

exists

public static final boolean exists(java.lang.String command)
Checks whether command execution causes any error. Can be used to check for the existence of an application.

Parameters:
command - String object holding the command to be executed.
Returns:
TRUE if command executes on the system, FALSE otherwise.
